title: fathafraink
author: fathafraink
content: Gaga token is one of the projects from the Meson Network team, which in the near future Gaga tokens can be traded.Ok, let's get straight to the point, here I will tell all my friends about how to get Gaga Tokens just by running a very simple Node, as forI will tell you there are two ways, namely;1.RUNNING NODE ON ANDROID2.Run Node on a Computer/Laptop that uses Windows OS.Okay, first of all, I will give all my colleagues the number 1 method, namely RUNNING NODE ON ANDROID, please follow the following method- Please register via the following link: https://dashboard.gaganode.com/register?referral_code=dortafkciy , please fill in the data on the link, such as; email (must be an active email in order to receive a verification code)    password, fill in the captcha (by adding up all the captcha tests), enter the verification code sent to your email (please check your email inbox), and then please fill in dortafkciy in the Invitation Code column.- After registering and successfully logging in, please click the "Install & Run" menu > Click "ANDROID" > Then copy the package address, or you can directly copy the following link to start downloading the apk file: https://assets.coreservice.io/public /package/32/gaganode/1.0.6/gaganode-1_0_6.apk > Please install the apk, then open it.- After the apk file has been successfully installed on your android, please open the application (gaga) and please paste your TOKEN (which you can find when opening the menu Install & Run > Android, as shown below), and then click START MINING- After it says Node Connected Successfully and Mining started successfully, please check WHETHER YOUR NODE IS ACTIVE OR NOT, by returning to the gaganode website on menu NODE,or copy and paste the following link : https://dashboard.gaganode.com/user_node- Go to Menu "REWARD"  (https://dashboard.gaganode.com/reward) to see the balance of the results of running the Node that you have successfully mined, REWARD BALANCE WILL MOVE TO BALANCE (https://dashboard.gaganode.com/credit_balance) EVERY HOUR 00:00 UTC - COMPLETED FOR METHOD NO 1, ie RUNNING NODE ON ANDROID.- Next METHOD NO 2 (Running Node on Computer/Laptop using Windows OS.), I will continue in the near future.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: So, anyone can install the apk and start mining without any cost? How will they prevent attacks like the 51% attack then? I think you need to explain more about profitability and the cost. For example, how profitable is it to run this on a mid-range Android phone, how much you can earn per day, how much electricity is required etc. One of the most obvious issues is whether our phones can sustain the heat or not. I don't believe phone mining is sustainable and profitable regardless of what we mine, and I think I'm not the only one who believes this.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: The reward become even less and less. It's not worthy to mine this for me but i don't think if others have same though like me too. I meant i have been watching gaga got hyped due to the partnership with huobi. This token potentially to be listed on huobi instantly without any doubt. I think that i kinda feel that bunch of people who mined this token were actually betting on it. The price was very cheap in the p2p. I would prefer to buy this token from others instead of doing mining. The reward was not even worthy with the time. People who were mining this token was wasting their time.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on January 03, 2023, 06:48:26 AMI think you need to explain more about profitability and the cost. For example, how profitable is it to run this on a mid-range Android phone, how much you can earn per day, how much electricity is required etc. One of the most obvious issues is whether our phones can sustain the heat or not.I agree with you mate. There are countless projects that tries to support mobile mining but of course tis performance affect the stability of mining and can cause early destruction with the device.Most projects that introduces it are probably dead by now. There are plenty of factors so bettet to focus on computer instead.
